# Data Source: nscale_region

Retrieves information about an existing region by its unique identifier.

## Example Usage

```hcl
data "nscale_region" "example" {
  id = "XXXXXXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXXXXXXXXXX"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) An unique identifier for the region.

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) The description of the region.
- `name` (String) The name of the region.
